member.remarks: This method returns the center point in the block where the text is drawn.

member.name: M:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.ZeroitUltimatePieChart.DrawingMetrics.RenderText(System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: Draws the text of the slice.
member.param: The Graphics on which the control is being rendered.

member.name: M:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.ZeroitUltimatePieChart.DrawingMetrics.TransformAngle(System.Single)
member.summary: Transforms the real angle of a pie slice into the angle that can be drawn at the given inclination. The angle must be transformed because when the circle representing the pie is drawn inclined, the angle on the circle must be made to match the angle on the corresponding ellipse.
member.param: The angle on a circle being transformed into an ellipse.
member.returns: The angle as it appears on an ellipse.

member.name: M:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.ZeroitUltimatePieChart.DrawingMetrics.ChangeColorBrightness(System.Drawing.Color,System.Single)
member.summary: Changes the brightness of a color by a correctionFactor, which is an integer between -1 and 1. A correction factor of -1 will make the color black, while a correction factor of 1 will make the color white.
member.param: The color to change the brightness of.
The factor to change the color's brightness by.

member.name: M:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.ZeroitUltimatePieChart.DrawingMetrics.GetAlphaTransparentSurfaceColor(System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Gets the correct alpha-transparent surface color from a given color. This takes into effect the proper brightness correction as well, and differentiates between the focused and nonfocused state.

member.name: P:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.ZeroitUltimatePieChart.DrawingMetrics.IsTopItem
member.summary: Gets whether or not this slice is a "top" slice, meaning that the slice contains 3*pi / 2 in its range and is thus at the top of the chart on the screen.
member.value: true if this instance is top item; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.ZeroitUltimatePieChart.DrawingMetrics.IsLeftItem
member.summary: Gets whether or not this is a "left" slice, meaning that the slice is bound between pi / 2 and 3 * pi / 2 and is thus on the left of the chart on the screen.
member.value: true if this instance is left item; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.ZeroitUltimatePieChart.DrawingMetrics.IsRightItem
member.summary: Gets whether or not this is a "right" slice, meaning that the slice is bound between 3 * pi / 2 and 5 * pi / 2 and is thus on the right of the chart on the screen.
member.value: true if this instance is right item; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.ZeroitUltimatePieChart.DrawingMetrics.IsBottomItem
member.summary: Gets whether or not this slice is a "bottom" slice, meaning that the slice contains pi / 2 in its range and is thus at the bottom of the chart on the screen.
member.value: true if this instance is bottom item; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.ZeroitUltimatePieChart.DrawingMetrics.CompareTo(Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.ZeroitUltimatePieChart.DrawingMetrics)
member.summary: Compares two DrawingMetrics. The criteria for comparison is what order the items should be drawn in.
member.returns: A positive value if this object is greater, 0 if the objects are equal, or a negative value if this object is less.

member.summary: Gets or sets if the pie should be sized to fit the control. If this property is true, the Radius property is ignored.
member.value: true if [automatic size pie]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.ZeroitUltimatePieChart.PieChartStyle.Radius
member.summary: Gets or sets radius of the control, in pixels. If AutoSizePie is set to true, this value will be ignored.

member.name: P:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.ZeroitUltimatePieChart.PieChartStyle.RadiusInternal
member.summary: Gets or sets the radius of the control, ignoring the AutoSizePie property.
member.exception: Radius - Radius must be a positive value.

member.name: P:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.ZeroitUltimatePieChart.PieChartStyle.Thickness
member.summary: Gets or sets thickness of the pie, in pixels.
member.exception: Thickness - Thickness must be greater than or equal to 0.
member.remarks: This represents the three-dimensional thickness of the control. The actual visual thickness of the control depends on the inclination. To determine what the apparent thickness of the control is, use the Style.VisualHeight property. The thickness must be greater than or equal to 0.

member.name: P:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.ZeroitUltimatePieChart.PieChartStyle.VisualThickness
member.summary: Gets the visual thickness of the pie, after the inclination has been taken into account.

member.name: P:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.ZeroitUltimatePieChart.PieChartStyle.Rotation
member.summary: Gets or sets the rotation of the pie chart. This is represented in radians, with positive values indicating a rotation in the clockwise direction.

member.name: P:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.ZeroitUltimatePieChart.PieChartStyle.Inclination
member.summary: Gets or sets the inclination of the control. This is represented in radians, where an angle of 0 represents looking at the edge of the control and an angle of pi represents looking straight down at the top of the pie.
member.exception: Inclination - The inclination must be a radian angle greater than 0 and less than or equal to PI / 2.
member.remarks: The angle must be greater than 0 and less than or equal to pi radians.

member.name: P:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.ZeroitUltimatePieChart.PieChartStyle.ShowEdges
member.summary: Gets or sets if edges should be drawn on pie slices. If false, edges are not drawn.

member.name: P:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.ZeroitUltimatePieChart.PieChartStyle.TextDisplayMode
member.summary: Gets or sets if text should be drawn on pie slices.
member.remarks: This can have one of three values. If TextDisplayTypes.Always, the text is always drawn. If TextDisplayTypes.FitOnly, the text is drawn only if it fits in the wedge. If TextDisplayTypes.Never, the text is never drawn.

member.name: P:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.ZeroitUltimatePieChart.PieChartStyle.ShowToolTips
member.summary: Gets or sets if tool tips should be shown when the mouse hovers over pie slices. If false, tool tips are not shown.
member.value: true if [show tool tips]; otherwise, false.

member.summary: The PieChartItem that has mouse focus.

member.name: P:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.ZeroitUltimatePieChart.Rotation
member.summary: Gets or sets the rotation of the pie chart. This is represented in radians, with positive values indicating a rotation in the clockwise direction.

member.name: P:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.ZeroitUltimatePieChart.Inclination
member.summary: Gets or sets the inclination of the control. This is represented in radians, where an angle of 0 represents looking at the edge of the control and an angle of pi represents looking straight down at the top of the pie.
member.remarks: The angle must be greater than 0 and less than or equal to pi radians.

member.name: P:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.ZeroitUltimatePieChart.Thickness
member.summary: Gets or sets thickness of the pie, in pixels.
member.remarks: This represents the three-dimensional thickness of the control. The actual visual thickness of the control depends on the inclination. To determine what the apparent thickness of the control is, use the Style.VisualHeight property. The thickness must be greater than or equal to 0.

member.name: P:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.ZeroitUltimatePieChart.Radius
member.summary: Gets or sets radius of the control, in pixels. If AutoSizePie is set to true, this value will be ignored.

member.name: P:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.ZeroitUltimatePieChart.AutoSizePie
member.summary: Gets or sets if the pie should be sized to fit the control. If this property is true, the Radius property is ignored.
member.value: true if [automatic size pie]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.ZeroitUltimatePieChart.ShowEdges
member.summary: Gets or sets if edges should be drawn on pie slices. If false, edges are not drawn.

member.name: P:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.ZeroitUltimatePieChart.TextDisplayMode
member.summary: Gets or sets if text should be drawn on pie slices.
member.remarks: This can have one of three values. If TextDisplayTypes.Always, the text is always drawn. If TextDisplayTypes.FitOnly, the text is drawn only if it fits in the wedge. If TextDisplayTypes.Never, the text is never drawn.

member.name: P:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.ZeroitUltimatePieChart.ShowToolTips
member.summary: Gets or sets if tool tips should be shown when the mouse hovers over pie slices. If false, tool tips are not shown.
member.value: true if [show tool tips]; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.ZeroitUltimatePieChart.GetChartSize(System.Windows.Forms.Padding)
member.summary: Determines how transparent surfaces of pie slices are. A SurfaceAlphaTransparency of 1 means the surfaces are completely opaque, while a SurfaceAlphaTransparency of 0 means the surfaces are completely transparent.

member.name: T:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.ScaleMode
member.summary: Scale mode for value aspect ratio

member.name: F:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.ScaleMode.Absolute
member.summary: Absolute Scale Mode: Values from 0 to 100 are accepted and displayed

member.name: F:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.ScaleMode.Relative
member.summary: Relative Scale Mode: All values are allowed and displayed in a proper relation

member.name: T:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.TimerMode
member.summary: Chart Refresh Mode Timer Control Mode

member.name: F:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.TimerMode.Disabled
member.summary: Chart is refreshed when a value is added

member.name: F:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.TimerMode.Simple
member.summary: Chart is refreshed every TimerInterval milliseconds, adding all values in the queue to the chart. If there are no values in the queue, a 0 (zero) is added

member.name: F:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.TimerMode.SynchronizedAverage
member.summary: Chart is refreshed every TimerInterval milliseconds, adding an average of all values in the queue to the chart. If there are no values in the queue, 0 (zero) is added

member.name: F:Zeroit.Framework.BasicCharts.TimerMode.SynchronizedSum
member.summary: Chart is refreshed every TimerInterval milliseconds, adding the sum of all values in the queue to the chart. If there are no values in the queue, 0 (zero) is added
